xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/130116-Al Di Meola - Speak a Volcano: Return to Electric Guitar 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3SuTggm2bpNe8gHlaNSkaXMs3v3.jpg After 30 years exploring a variety of styles, Al Di Meola still ranks among the most popular guitar-masters of jazz and jazz-rock. Here, on his first electric DVD filmed in Leverkusen in Nov. 2006, Di Meola rediscovers his love of the electric guitar without denying newer influences. Al Di Meola - Speak a Volcano: Return to Electric Guitar
